text:
apr_getservbyname calls getservbyname, even when threads are defined.  
Other functions like gethostbyname have defines like GETHOSTBYNAME_IS_THREAD_SAFE
and HAVE_GETHOSTBYNAME_R to detect the thread saftey issues.
creator: ctaylor@wadeford.plus.com

text:
For instance, Solaris 10 claims the functions are thread safe:

http://docs.sun.com/app/docs/doc/816-5170/6mbb5es9l?l=en&a=view&q=getservbyname+solaris+10

However, not so in Solaris 9:

http://docs.sun.com/app/docs/doc/817-3943/6mjgk1jb0?l=en&a=view&q=getservbyname+solaris+9

So, given that we have at least one OS that would for sure require use of thread safe functions, I think this should be fixed.
